EmailTemplate.name: 06_12_2014 London vForum.Email_use
EmailTemplate.subject: London VMware vForum
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank You, Turbofriend.
We saw you in London, and it was a pleasure.
Thank you for speaking with us at VMware's London vForum London 2014. We wanted to send you some videos that show how VMTurbo has redefined the virtual operations landscape, improving the way that world-class organizations control and automate their virtual data centers. More Videos <http://bit.ly/SOfnfd> Downloads White Papers Products 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
